Name: Shrouding Armor
Effect: Enemies must be within 2 hexes to attack

Name: Blade Armor
Effect: M attackers take 1 hit on failed check of 2 and +1 M and R Def

Name: Shrieking Bow
Effect: +1 R Att and -1 Morale for enemies

Name: Fiery Blade
Effect: +1 M Att and enemies take 1 hit on failed check of 2

Name: Strange Amulet
Effect: +3 Mana cap and +1 per 4 caster levels

Name: Legionary Banner
Effect: +1 M Def for each adj unit of same type

Name: Dragon Banner
Effect: +1 Morale R and M Att and Def
